mapper.select: SELECT seq , id , name , password , is_expired AS isExpired , is_locked AS isLocked , is_use AS isUse FROM account WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( id , name , password , is_expired , is_locked , is_use , reg_date , reg_person , last_mod_date , last_mod_person ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{name} , #{password} , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , #{id} , getDate() , #{id} , getDate() )
